title: The prognostic relevance of a gene expression signature in MRI-defined highly vascularized glioblastoma

Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Víctor Montosa-i-Micó, María del Mar Álvarez-Torres, Rebeca Burgos-Panadero, F. Javier Gil-Terrón, Maria Gómez Mahiques, Carles Lopez-Mateu, Juan M. García-Gómez, Elies Fuster-Garcia
